title: Elderly people being excluded from medical research in UK, charities warn
description: The exclusion of older people from research due to arbitrary age cut-offs could stall the development of life-saving treatments
content:
People aged over 75 are being excluded from health research due to arbitrary age cut-offs, potentially stalling the development of life-saving treatments, leading charities and research institutes have warned.

title: Zelenskyy welcomes European leaders’ insistence on Ukraine role at peace talks
description: Ukrainian leader ‘fully supports’ statement before Trump-Putin summit that Kyiv must be part of ‘path to peace’
content:
The Ukrainian president, Volodymyr Zelenskyy, has welcomed a statement from European allies that insists the “path to peace in Ukraine cannot be decided without Ukraine”, before a planned summit between Donald Trump and Vladimir Putin.

title: Love? Actually, no: Emma Thompson reveals Donald Trump asked her on a date
description: Actor said Trump phoned her to make the offer on the day her divorce from Kenneth Branagh was confirmed in 1998
content:
Emma Thompson has accepted Academy Awards, Baftas and even a damehood over a glittering career, but there was one offer she had to turn down.
The actor says she once got asked out on a date by Donald Trump on the same day her divorced was confirmed.

title: I thought we’d entered the age of body positivity. Then came ‘shrinking girl summer’ - is everyone getting smaller except me?
description: It’s been the year of weight-loss drugs, with celebrities seemingly disappearing before our eyes. For those of us left behind, it’s both a torment and a temptation. Spoiler alert: I tried the jabs, too
